text: Sabse pehle Shopify platform ko ache se seekhen.  Iske features, policies aur optimization techniques samajhna bohat zaroori hai.
Apne store ko successful banane ke liye digital marketing aur SEO zaruri hai. Paid aur organic traffic dono pe focus karen.
Sahi niche choose karna bohat important hai. Kam competition wali aur zyada demand wali niche dhundhen.
Apna store mobile-friendly aur user-friendly banayen.  Loading speed aur navigation pe dhyan den.
Customer support bohat important hai.  Timely replies aur ache service se customers ko khush rakhen.
Agar drop shipping kar rahe hain tou reliable suppliers dhundhen jo ache quality products timely deliver karen.
Ek supplier pe depend na rahen. Multiple suppliers rakhne se risks kam hote hain.
